pages.text: $(li)Wolves are neutral creatures which can be found over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They can be tamed giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone)Bones$(/l).$(br)$(li)Once tamed, they will assist you combating hostile creatures and can be ordered to sit right clicking on them.

$(li)When Wolves are hungry, they will eat any meat that they find on the ground and they will attack nearby animals too.$(br)$(li)Wolves can be equiped with $(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/leather_wolf_armor)Wolf Armors$(/l).$(br)$(li)If a Wolf dies, it will stay on the ground for 3 days, in this time you can heal it with $(l:patchouli:pets/save_your_pets/pet_bandage)Pet Bandages$(/l).
$(li)Tamed wolves collars can be tinted right click on them while you are holding a dye on your hand.
